SET NOCOUNT ON /********************************************************************/ /* 광고&단말기테이블 로그 - T_AD_DEVICE_LOG 조회 - SELECTPAGE QUERY */ /********************************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED DECLARE @PAGE_COUNT INT = {0} ,@PAGE INT = {1}; WITH T_TABLE AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {2}) AS ROW_IDX , A.IDX , A.AD_CODE , A.DEVICE_CODE , AD.TITLE , A.FR_DATE , A.TO_DATE , AD.AD_FRAME_TYPE , DE.DEVICE_NAME , A.CLICK_CNT , CM.NAME AS STATUS , A.REMARK , A.REMARK2 , A.UPDATE_DATE , AST.STORE_NAME AS AD_STORE_NAME , DST.STORE_NAME AS DEVICE_STORE_NAME FROM T_AD_DEVICE_LOG A INNER JOIN T_COMMON CM ON CM.MAIN_CODE = 'A009' AND CM.SUB_CODE = A.STATUS INNER JOIN T_AD AD ON AD.AD_CODE = A.AD_CODE INNER JOIN T_DEVICE DE ON DE.DEVICE_CODE = A.DEVICE_CODE INNER JOIN T_STORE AST ON AST.STORE_CODE = AD.STORE_CODE INNER JOIN T_STORE DST ON DST.STORE_CODE = DE.STORE_CODE INNER JOIN T_MEMBER ME ON ME.MEMBER_CODE = A.UPDATE_CODE
WHERE 1=1 #[AD_CODE] #[TITLE] #[DEVICE_CODE] #[DEVICE_NAME] #[STATUS] #[AD_STORE_CODE] #[DEVICE_STORE_CODE] #[USER_ID] #[USER_NAME] #[FR_DATE] #[TO_DATE] ) SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_TABLE) AS TOTAL_ROWCOUNT FROM T_TABLE WHERE ROW_IDX > (@PAGE-1) * @PAGE_COUNT AND ROW_IDX <= @PAGE * @PAGE_COUNT
SET NOCOUNT OFF
